info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 03 at 3:32PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...Gusty showers will impact portions of Schenectady, southeastern Warren, northern Albany, southeastern Fulton, Saratoga, northeastern Schoharie, Washington, Montgomery, northwestern Rensselaer and northern Bennington Counties through 415 PM EST... At 331 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking gusty showers along a line extending from near Poultney Village to near Ephratah. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Albany, Schenectady, Troy, Clifton Park, Rotterdam, Saratoga Springs, Amsterdam, Cohoes, Gloversville, Glens Falls, Watervliet, Johnstown, Colonie, Scotia, Hudson Falls, Mechanicville, Whitehall, Arlington, Canajoharie and Salem. This includes the following highways... Interstate 88 between exits 24 and 25. Interstate 90 between exits 6 and 29. Interstate 890 between exits 1a and 9. Interstate 87 between exits 23 and 7, and between exits 8A and 21. Interstate 787 between exits 5 and 9. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
